EmailTemplate.subject: Roles are filling fast! Complete your application by 1 May to be fast-tracked.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for starting an application for a seasonal role on the NCS programme. We can see that your profile is nearly complete and you're almost there! Roles are filling fast as we approach the end of our recruitment period, so getting your application in now is highly recommended!
We don't want you to miss out on working on the NCS programme, so we wanted to give you the opportunity to fast-track your application. Get your application in by 1st May deadline and benefit from:
a greater choice of assessment dates. a greater choice of locations and dates available if we are able to offer you are role. as your application is nearly complete it shouldn't take long to finish it!
Your application will be fast-tracked if you submit your online application by the 1 May deadline.
Click here to continue your application
Please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org if you have any queries or if you are no longer interested in working with us. Please ensure you quote the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We look forward to receiving your completed application soon!
Best wishes,
The Challenge
NCS Programme
seasonal-roles@the-challenge.org
